SamPy.focus.collect_focus.append_to_FocusModel¶

SamPy.focus.collect_focus.append_to_FocusModel(inputfile, outputfile, path)¶

This function appends new measurements to existing data files that are read by e.g. Colin’s focustool.

Param :inputfile: Name of the input data file that potentially contains new data.
Param :outputfile: Name of the output dat file to which new data are appended to.
Param :path: Path from where the outputfile can be found.
Returns:Boolean indicating if new data were identified.
Return type:boolean
